bioAsHtml: I discovered computer science in high school, building a crazy medieval-style mmorg. I loved it and couldn't stop programming since then. I have been working in several french start-up (commercial prospecting, predictive sales, supplier management). I currently work for Datastax as Solution Architect. In my free time, I am passionate about machine learning. I am also a diving and freediving instructor and I just love any kind of water sports.

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
acceptedTalks.title: Machine learning et séries temporelles : Comment prédire les ventes de votre site ecommerce avec Spark

bio: I discovered computer science in high school, building a crazy medieval-style mmorg. I loved it and couldn't stop programming since then. I have been working in several french start-up (commercial prospecting, predictive sales, supplier management). I currently work for Datastax as Solution Architect. In my free time, I am passionate about machine learning. I am also a diving and freediving instructor and I just love any kind of water sports.
